heading: market watch
subheading: us stocks surged in early monday trading, led by computer and internet-related stocks, on optimism about the growth of the economy in the new year. the wired index rose 12.07 to 579.31, the dow jones industrial average gained 125.39 to 9306.82, and the nasdaq advanced 31.22 to a record 2223.91.
author: wired staff
text: us stocks surged in early monday trading, led by computer and internet-related stocks, on optimism about the growth of the economy in the new year. the  wired index rose 12.07 to 579.31, the dow jones industrial average gained 125.39 to 9306.82, and the nasdaq advanced 31.22 to a record 2223.91.
